title: Genetic Matrix
description: Genetic Matrix cloud and app-based software bring you the largest and most comprehensive selection of Human Design and Astrology charts and tools. Discover what is possible with our Multi-Platform App. Perfect for beginners interested in Human Design, and professionals looking for advanced features and functionality. The App includes all professional-level Human Design charts, talking charts, connection, BG5 Penta and so much more. The App is FREE for all our members and fully integrated with our cloud-delivered web services. We have an array of flexible pricing and Membership Plans to suit any budget. Enjoy the benefit of multiple language support. descriptionHTML:
Genetic Matrix cloud and app-based software bring you the largest and most comprehensive selection of Human Design and Astrology charts and tools. Discover what is possible with our Multi-Platform App. Perfect for beginners interested in Human Design, and professionals looking for advanced features and functionality. The App includes all professional-level Human Design charts, talking charts, connection, BG5 Penta and so much more.

The App is FREE for all our members and fully integrated with our cloud-delivered web services. We have an array of flexible pricing and Membership Plans to suit any budget. Enjoy the benefit of multiple language support.
